title: First unit of 30 MW capacity at SJVN Naitwar Mori hydro electric project starts power supply
description: The second unit of the project is also scheduled to be synchronised this month. The project will generate 265.5 million units of electricity annually. The SJVN has constructed a 37-km 220 KV transmission line for evacuation of power from Naitwar Mori HEP from Bainol to Snail.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
